Q20:- Who designed the Indian Parliament House?
Q89:- The 'Electoral College' for the election of the President of India consists of:
options: Elected members of Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha
Elected members of Parliament and State Legislative Assemblies
All members of Parliament and State Legislative Assemblies
questions.answer: Elected members of Parliament and State Legislative Assemblies

questions.question: Q41:- The 'Zero Hour' in the Indian Parliament refers to:
options: The first hour of the session
The time immediately following the Question Hour
The last hour of the session
The time when no business is transacted
questions.answer: The time immediately following the Question Hour

questions.question: Q47:- The smallest Union Territory in India by population is:
